text: Gigablaster is a Brazilian Animated Series produced by TeamTO and WildBrain Dublín in co-production with Gloob It is written by Eric Shaw. The Gigablaster family of characters has a very playful blue rhinoceros, a shy DJ, an explosive guitarist, and an absent-minded, deaf zombie. They live in a karaoke in a large city. Together, Giga, Ziggy and Rubi are part of a band managed by Cool Daddy. They end up getting in trouble with villains ranging from Shimeji God to GossipCam Paparazzi. == List of episodes == Original PT-BR Title 2019 2020 2023 Isso É Super, Isso É Mega, Isso É Gigablaster! This is Super, This is Mega, This is Gigablaster! 01 Você Vem Sempre Aqui? You come here often? 02 Pizza Pizza 03 ==References== Category:2019 television series debuts Category:Brazilian television series Category:2010s animated television series
title: Gigablaster
